alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 2:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central El Paso County through 315 PM MDT... At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schriever Space Force Base, or 14 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Colorado Springs, Black Forest, Ellicott, Schriever Space Force Base, Falcon, Cimarron Hills and Peterson Space Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
